transArray.content: The service is good, the environment is good, there is supper, everything is very good, I like the blackout curtains, it's really dark, I can sleep well, drinks are free in the room, the atmosphere downstairs is very good, there is a laundry room, gym, billiard table and billiard bar! The only thing is that there is too much dust in the room, there is fluffy dust everywhere, the housewife is so meticulous, it is very obvious when the lights are turned on! ! In addition, the air conditioner can't heat, but can only cool down. It's very cold after taking a shower, but the air conditioner can't be turned on.
